snippet: Talks are still under way, but a News Corporation deal with the YES Network, the cable channel based in New York that broadcasts Yankees baseball and Nets basketball games, could be completed soon, possibly as early as Friday, Amy Chozick and Michael...
abstract: Talks are still under way, but a News Corporation deal with the YES Network, the cable channel based in New York that broadcasts Yankees baseball and Nets basketball games, could be completed soon, possibly as early as Friday, Amy Chozick and Michael Cieply report for The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: Talks are still under way, but a News Corporation deal with the YES Network, the cable channel based in New York that broadcasts Yankees baseball and Nets basketball games, could be completed soon, possibly as early as Friday, Amy Chozick and Michael Cieply report for The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: News Corp. Said to Be Close to Acquiring Stake in YES Network
